content: your headband turned out a little on the long side and worked on 13 stitches in between the 2x2 rib border you can reach the two ends together go ahead and just following the lace pattern above work as stated keep seam them together using a spare piece of yarn doing these pattern repeats until you need to start decreasing a note on blocking i didn t need to block mine at all - it for the correct length hold down the co tip of the stretched rather firmly against my head so it kind of knitting to the nape of your neck and then pull the knitting blocked itself as with all things lace however blocking is across your head - once it seems like you ve reached the definitely recommended especially if your headband is on other side of your head about an inch or so above the ears the looser side no judgement intended start your decrease it is better to start decreasing sooner rather than later these things stretch
